info.description:
A production-ready Go backend template built on clean architecture principles.
Features include JWT authentication with multiple algorithms (HMAC, RSA, ECDSA),
multi-language validation (English/Indonesian), RabbitMQ message queuing,
Redis caching with LZ4 compression, and comprehensive error handling.
info.title: Ichi-Go API

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password, returns access and refresh tokens
Invalidate current user session (client should discard tokens)
Generate new access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token
Create a new user account with email, password, and name

400.description: Invalid request, validation error, or user already exists

get.description: Returns basic service health status and uptime
Fast health check for Kubernetes liveness probe
Checks all dependencies (database, redis, rabbitmq) for readiness
Retrieve recent permission check decisions (allowed/denied) with performance metrics

post.description: Export audit logs to CSV or JSON format with optional filtering

get.description: Retrieve audit logs with comprehensive filtering and pagination options
Retrieve recent policy and role mutations (additions, removals, assignments, revocations)
Retrieve audit statistics including event counts by action, decision stats, and performance metrics

post.description: Check multiple resource-action permissions for a user in a single request
Check if a user has permission to perform an action on a resource

get.description: Retrieve all permissions for the authenticated user in a specific tenant

parameters.description: Tenant ID (uses request context if not provided)
parameters.name: tenant_id

get.description: Retrieve policies with optional filtering by tenant or role with pagination

post.description: Add a new permission policy for a role in a tenant

delete.description: Remove a permission policy from a role in a tenant

get.description: Get total count of policies, optionally filtered by tenant

post.description: Reload all policies from database into Casbin enforcer (admin operation)

get.description: Retrieve all roles with optional filtering by tenant or global scope, with pagination

post.description: Create a new role (global or tenant-specific)

get.description: Retrieve a single role by its ID

put.description: Update an existing role's name or description

delete.description: Soft delete a role (marks as deleted)

get.description: Retrieve a role with all its associated permissions
Retrieve all users that have been assigned a specific role in a tenant

parameters.description: Tenant ID (uses request context if not provided)
parameters.name: tenant_id

get.description: Retrieve all roles assigned to a specific user in a tenant

parameters.description: Tenant ID (uses request context if not provided)
parameters.name: tenant_id

post.description: Assign a role to a user in a specific tenant

get.description: Retrieve only active (non-expired) roles for a specific user in a tenant

parameters.description: Tenant ID (uses request context if not provided)
parameters.name: tenant_id

delete.description: Revoke a role assignment from a user in a specific tenant

parameters.description: Revoke role request (optional tenant_id and reason)
parameters.name: request

ichi-go_internal_applications_auth_dto.L.description: Successful authentication response containing user info and JWT tokens

ichi-go_internal_applications_auth_dto.R.description: Refresh token for obtaining new access token

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization

tags.description: Authentication and authorization endpoints including login, register, token refresh, and user profile
tags.name: Auth
